results.name: Triangle read by rows: 2*A131821 - A000012.
link: B. D. Swan, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..100000
formula: 2*A131821 - A000012 as an infinite lower triangular matrix. 2*n - 1, (1, 3, 5, 7, ...) as right and left borders, with the rest zeros.
